# is-breadcrumb-item



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                | Type      | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------- | ----------- |
| `active` | `active`  | Active the condition active of item, basically used by latest item in breadcrumb component | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `href`   | `href`    | Contains a URL If prop is set, an anchor tag will be rendered                              | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `target` | `target`  | Where to display linked url apply when `href` props provided clue: `_blank, _self`         | `string`  | `undefined` |
